import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Country } from '../../interfaces/country.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-country-table', templateUrl: './country-table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./country-table.component.css'] }) export class CountryTableComponent { @Input() countries: Country[] = []; }
